name: Dungeon Marathon
description: Dungeon Marathon is a new style of game where you must run through Dungeons, no fighting allowed!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.6GHZ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 64MB INTEGRATED DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 82 MB available space Additional Notes: Old 4:3 resolutions are not supported
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or later Processor: 2.0GHZ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 64MB  INTEGRATED DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 82 MB available space Additional Notes: Old 4:3 resolutions are not supported
